title: Matplotlib Horizontal Bar Chart
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create a horizontal bar chart using the Python Matplotlib library. A horizontal bar chart is a chart that displays data as horizontal bars. It is useful for comparing data across different categories.

meta.title: Mastering Horizontal Bar Charts with Matplotlib
meta.description: Learn how to create visually appealing and informative horizontal bar charts using the Python Matplotlib library.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, horizontal bar chart, data visualization, python, programming tutorial
